briefTitle: A Comparison of Primary Care and Traditional Internal Medicine Residents
officialTitle: A Comparison of Primary Care and Traditional Internal Medicine Residents
conditions: Breast Cancer Screening, Cervical Cancer Screening, Cholesterol Screening, Asthma Admission Rate, Diabetes Management
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To identify the differences between primary care and traditional medicine residents in clinical performance, continuity of care and utilization of resources.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Patients who are followed as outpatients by a Cornell affiliated internist at the Cornell Internal Medicine Associates (CIMA).
2. Patients at New York Hospital who may or may not go on to be followed as outpatients at CIMA.

Exclusion Criteria:

Patients who elect not to participate in the study.
